item.title: Academic Partners
item.description: In Trusted IoT, the research is conducted by 5 parters from Belgium and Germany. Belgian Partners Vrije Universiteit Brussel (VUB) Name of research group An Braeken https://www.vub.be KU Leuven Emerging technologies, systems and security Nele Mentens KU Leuven German Partners Brandenburg University of Technology Cottbus-Senftenberg Name of research group Marc Reichenbach https://www.b-tu.de/ Technische Universit√§t Dresden, Faculty of Computer Science, Chair of Adaptive Dynamic systems Name of research group
